Dead by Daylight has been extensively improved by it's updates. A large cast of survivors and killers means that each game feels different.

The community is extremely toxic at times, but it comes with these sorta elimination games. Give it a go for a couple of hours and see what you think.

오랫동안 공포 온라인 게임으로써 자리를 지켜준 고마운 친구다.
처음 접하는 사람들은 살인마에게서 숨은 공포나 짜릿함 또는 사람들을 패는 맛에 즐길 것이고, 올드 유저들은 심리전을 하면서 탈출하거나 모든 생존자를 죽이는 것에 짜릿함을 느낄 수 있는 꽤나 재밌는 게임이다

Ignore your the negativity and always bring a friend and this game can be amazing! Try to be competitive and feed into the saltiness and vugarity and you will find that this game is not a fun experience. Rewarding for those who grind. No pay to win system. All killers are viable and the middle ranks. Survivors have the potential to be overpowered. The devs listen to the community are constantly finding ways to keep game fresh. Highly recommend everyone tries it for at least an hour on both Killer and Survivor sides. Something for everyone. Stay positive my friends. :)

тут даже обсуждать нечего! Когда она еще только выходила, узнал о ней из payday2 из-за масок, тогда не впечатлило. Прошло время, и я все же решился сыграть в нее на бесплатной неделе. Изменений с тех пор было уйма, и все они отличные, игра стала только краше. Я ее сразу купил и ни капли не пожалел.  Однако, даже в такой бочке меда есть ложка дёгтя. Разрабы очень жадные, за внутриигровые купить героев и убийц сложно,идет просто прямая выжимка покупки DLC(а 4 из них вообще только за реал покупаются). А ведь еще есть косметика, которая еще дороже. В итоге нужно быть или богатым, или одиноким(чтобы задрочить игру). Но при этом все равно игра отличная!

A very Fun horror experience for both the Killer and Survivor. For Killer, it's the fun and Thrill of the Hunt that makes them fun. For the Survivor it's the Resilience and the will to survive that makes playing them fun. The game is still a little buggy with it's vaults and pallets (and hit detection), but otherwise, it really is a fun experience.

Pretty much the best "Play a slasher movie killer" game out right now. The game constantly updates with balance changes and new characters, which can be good and bad. Every 3 months or so a new DLC comes out for $7 with a new killer, survivor, and map. While you can pay for it, you can also earn shards in-game to get it without paying, which I appreciate. 

If I could mention one thing that could presuade you not to pick this up, it is this. This is a very toxic community, or at least it can be. I recommend having your steam profile to friends only and ignoring the after lobby chat, that way you can mostly ignore the toxicity. (When i first got the game, it was in the process of getting review bombed because of an actually needed balance change.) This game takes awhile to get used to, and even longer to get all of the perks you want. Despite this, it is a lot of fun as both survivor and killer, and it is a lot of fun to survive with friends (even if it can lead to some irritating killer matches if everyone's on discord). You can even play solely with friends with all the perks available, which is always fun to verbally taunt each other while chasing each other. 

Basic outline, if you have at least one friend who can show you the ropes, and if you can get used to both roles, this game will keep you entertained for a long while.
